Yep, to do 'possession', a ghost would have to have a high power 
level.  Another possible power is 'take over'.  A ghost takes over a 
characters body and turns the character's soul into another ghost.  
This power would require an extremely high power level. These two new 
powers would make people rethink the idea of having one character 
powerfull enough to take the rest of the characters out.

What about giving a fire elemental the power to lanch multiple 
fireballs at a given target and the ability to launch a more 
powerfull fireball attack?
